vclaim: Curb Your Enthusiasm began filming its eleventh season in November 2020, during the COVID-19 pandemic.
title: Was ‘Curb Your Enthusiasm’ Filming Season 11 During COVID-19 Pandemic?
subtitle: The HBO series "Curb Your Enthusiasm," which aired 10 seasons over 20 years, often left fans wondering when the show would return for a new season.
author: Jordan Liles
